content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” and furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs, research set to automation; status NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 10056.
- ElectricityGroup with id=10056 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage=0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) holding ~200 units of water at 15°; status NO_FUEL with connection points (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), steam output at (-7.5, 24.5) and fluid_system updated to [37260].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with connection point (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holding 100 units of water at 15° and fluid_system updated to [37260].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37260 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37261 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37262 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37267 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37266 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37271 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37270 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37273 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Fluid System Identifier Mismatch and Invalid ID Usage:
  • Repeated connection attempts used fluid_system IDs [36916, 36959, 37002, 37045, 37088, 37131, 37174, 37217] that did not correspond to a working PipeGroup. Always retrieve the current valid fluid_system (currently [37260]) from the boiler or offshore pump before initiating a connection.
- Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  • A fixed 10-second delay for pipeline stabilization leads to premature connection attempts. Use dynamic connectivity checks to confirm PipeGroup readiness.
- Persistently Failed Steam Engine Connection:
  • Continuous failures to connect the steam engine indicate misalignment or mismatched connection configurations. Reassess spatial arrangements and verify fluid system compatibility prior to connection.
